m_szDocSumamry: Honda to offer new electric car, plug-in hybrid model by 2018 January 14, 2015 12:01 AM Above: The 2014 Honda Accord Plug-In Hybrid Honda had no new products to unveil at this year’s Detroit Auto Show, although it did show its hydrogen fuel-cell powered Honda FCV Concept car for the first time in North America. The company announced, however, that it would produce two all-new plug-in vehicles by 2018: one battery-electric car and one plug-in hybrid.
